title: Item Profile Template
description: Defines a significant item (magical, technological, or regular). Items gain meaning from association, not just properties. Limitations on items are more valuable than powers -- avoid solving problems too easily.

significance_source.description: Why this item matters (association with person/event/place, inherent properties, both)

limitations.description: What the item cannot do or what limits it

on_off_capability.description: Whether and how powers can be activated/deactivated

deterioration.description: Whether the item degrades over time

who_can_use.description: Restrictions on who can use it (species, magic talent, training, bloodline)

x-cross-references.magic-item-detail: Magic items have additional details in the Magic Item Detail Sheet
x-cross-references.technological-item-detail: Tech items have additional details in the Technological Item Detail Sheet
x-cross-references.world-figure-profile: May be associated with a world figure
x-cross-references.history-entry: Item history may be formal history entries
